description: National Area Based Development Programme - Phase III - Aiming and contributing to a sustainable reduction of poverty and improving livelihoods in rural areas in Afghanistan

subproject.description:
Output 1.1: Communities mobilized to articulate their needs and identify priorities and solutions 
Output 1.2: Capacity developed in District Development Assemblies to allow them to function as district-level coordination entities.
Output 1.3: Institutional arrangements developed to mainstream gender equality/women’s empowerment in all components and projects 
Output 1.4: Effective Mechanisms developed to ensure equal gender participation at district level.
Output 1.5:  District-level management committees established and trained in Disaster and risk Management 
Output 2.1: Community energy projects established and sustainability concerns addressed 
Output 2.2:  Capacity built for operations and maintenance of rural energy systems and services at the district level
Output 2.3: Rural energy development activities institutionalized and up scaled 
Output 2.4: Small scale agricultural infrastructure built and accessible by rural communities
Output 2.5: Community-based natural resource management systems are effectively supported
Output 3.1: Community development consultative mechanisms and stability models tested then established in high-risk areas
Output 3.2: Socio - economic community development projects (Disbandment of Illegal Armed Groups) are delivered
Output 3.3:  Public-private partnerships and quick-impact projects implemented in insecure areas linked to poppy reduction. 
Output 3.4: Strengthen institutional capacities to support licit livelihoods in rural communities
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: National Area Based Developmnt
